<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/2.0/keys"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Creates a user API key with the parameters specified in the request.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"required":["name"],"type":"object","properties":{"name":{"maxLength":30,"minLength":0,"type":"string","description":"The API key name.","example":"Winfield Upton"},"permissions":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"},"description":"The list of permissions granted to the API key.","nullable":true,"example":["some text"]},"expiresInDays":{"maximum":365,"minimum":1,"type":"integer","description":"The number of days until the API key expires (null for no expiration).","format":"int32","nullable":true,"example":1234}},"additionalProperties":false,"description":"The request parameters for creating a new API key.","title":"CreateApiKeyRequestDto"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
